user.title: Battery & Inverter
user.description: Configure your battery system and inverter for smart charging.

data_description.inverter_switch_entity_id: The switch that enables grid charging on your inverter.
data_description.battery_capacity_kwh: Total usable capacity of your battery system.

sensors.title: Energy Sensors
sensors.description: Select sensors for consumption tracking and solar forecasting.

data_description.house_load_power_sensor_entity_id: Sensor measuring house power consumption in Watts. Used to learn your daily patterns.
data_description.solar_forecast_sensor_entity_id: Tomorrow's expected solar production in kWh.
data_description.solar_forecast_today_sensor: Today's expected solar production in kWh.

schedule.title: Schedule & Tuning
schedule.description: Configure the charging window and algorithm parameters.

data_description.charging_window_start: Time when the charging window opens (typically after midnight).
data_description.charging_window_end: Time when the charging window closes (typically early morning).
data_description.min_soc_reserve_percent: Battery level always kept in reserve, never used for consumption.
data_description.safety_spread_percent: Extra energy buffer added to the calculated charge need.
data_description.ev_timeout_hours: Hours before EV energy request automatically resets to zero.
data_description.battery_bypass_switch: Switch to enable direct grid-to-EV charging when battery is insufficient.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.description: Configure when to receive notifications about charging activity.

data_description.notify_on_start: Send notification when charging window opens with the calculated plan.
data_description.notify_on_update: Send notification when plan changes (e.g., EV energy added).
data_description.notify_on_end: Send notification when charging completes or window closes.
data_description.notify_service: Home Assistant notification service to use (e.g., notify.mobile_app_phone).

pricing.title: Energy Pricing
pricing.description: Configure electricity rates to track your savings.

data_description.pricing_mode: Choose between two-tier (day/night) or three-tier (F1/F2/F3) pricing.
data_description.price_peak_eur_kwh: Daytime electricity rate in EUR per kWh.
data_description.price_offpeak_eur_kwh: Nighttime electricity rate in EUR per kWh.
